text: I don't know about you but I'm a big fan
of snack and I like to have healthy
snacks around if I can so today I'm
going to share with you something that I
kind of love it's a garden veggie dip
the base is neuchâtel which is like
cream cheese it's a lower fat version
and nonfat Greek yogurt but on top of
all of that it's filled with fresh
garden vegetables I'm grading on a box
grater three carrots this is also a
really great thing to put out with
vegetables or chips at a holiday like
Thanksgiving when you have guests over
and people are milling around waiting to
eat they can snack on something light
and healthy before the big meal done you
also have two scallions thinly sliced
this adds a nice mild oniony flavor
without being overwhelming at all which
I love two stalks of celery diced make
the dice nice and small because this is
a dip and you don't want big chunks if
the chunks were too big it would just
fall right off your chip right that
looks like a salad right it's gonna make
a delicious dip though in this bowl I
have 1 8 ounce package of neuchâtel and
add the vegetables to that and then the
carrots and scallions mash everything
together just to start off with get it
nice and soft and combined and then you
can add the remaining ingredients okay
now you can add your yogurt it's a cup
of Greek yogurt nonfat or low-fat this
makes a generous amount too which makes
it great for a party for seasoning about
a teaspoon of lemon zest just gonna do
it right over the bowl and then a
tablespoon of the juice season with salt
and pepper and you have a dip it's as
easy as that
right as with salad dressings I feel
like homemade dips are so much better
than store-bought and most of them are
actually super easy to make so you
should give it a try looking really good
tada serve it up with some vegetables or
chips or whatever you want to snack on
what do you think it's bright and fresh
and great for any occasion
you
